TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CatalogZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase

summary.span: 做為在 Web 網頁上裝載 控制項之 Web 組件控制項集合的主要控制項。

span.span: Serves as the primary control in the Web Parts control set for hosting controls on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制項集合中，區域是包含 Web 組件控制項的網頁上的區域。Within the Web Parts control set, a zone is a region on a Web page that contains Web Parts controls. Web 組件區域由區域控制項，也就是類型的設計成包含其他控制項。A Web Parts zone is created by a zone control, which is a type of designed to contain other controls. 區域的主要功能是它包含，控制項的版面配置設定，並為這些控制項提供常見的使用者介面 (UI)。The primary functions of a zone are to lay out the controls it contains, and to provide a common user interface (UI) for those controls. 如需區域以及如何在 Web 組件的應用程式中使用它們的一般資訊，請參閱基底類別，並[Web 組件控制集概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff0149e4-695a-401a-8cda-53df6d7d2668)。For general information about zones and how they are used in Web Parts applications, see the base class, and [Web Parts Control Set Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff0149e4-695a-401a-8cda-53df6d7d2668). Web 組件控制項的主要功能是它們根據其喜好設定，讓使用者修改 （或個人化） 網頁，並將其個人化的設定儲存為未來的瀏覽器工作階段。A key feature of Web Parts controls is that they allow end users to modify (or personalize) Web pages according to their preferences, and save their personalized settings for future browser sessions. 修改 Web 組件頁面的其中一個層面包括能夠加入控制項或其他伺服器控制項加入 Web 組件頁面。One aspect of modifying Web Parts pages includes the ability to add controls or other server controls to a Web Parts page. 控制項提供的清單或目錄的使用者可以加入至網頁的控制項。The control provides a list or catalog of controls that users can add to a page. 控制項是其中一個基本 Web 組件控制項集合中的控制項。The control is one of the fundamental controls in the Web Parts control set. 它衍生自類別和其行為大多繼承自該類別。It derives from the class, and most of its behavior is inherited from that class. 類別基本上是將基底類別在區域樣板，也就是實作的介面。The class essentially adds to the base class a zone template, which is an implementation of the interface. 在區域樣板可讓開發人員以宣告方式新增控制項以頁面保存格式中的區域。The zone template enables developers to declaratively add controls to a zone in the page persistence format. > [!IMPORTANT] > A只能包含區域控制項，反之亦然，控制項只可位於區域衍生自類別，例如。A zone can contain only controls, and conversely, controls can reside only in zones that derive from the class, such as . A就會看到控制項只有當使用者切換網頁至目錄顯示模式 ()。A control becomes visible only when a user switches a Web page to catalog display mode (). 目錄可以包含數種控制項。A catalog can contain several types of controls. 每個控制項是一種容器，其中包含使用者可以加入至網頁伺服器控制項。Each control is a type of container that contains the server controls users can add to the page. 控制項，則根據它們包含伺服器控制項出處而有所不同。The controls differ according to where the server controls they contain are coming from. 下表摘要說明提供何種伺服器控制項，它包含與 Web 組件控制項集合，每個控制項，可控制。The following table summarizes the controls provided with the Web Parts control set and, for each control, what kind of server controls it contains. |控制項Control|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||會維護 頁面已關閉的控制項的參考。Maintains references to controls that have been closed on a page. 這些控制項可以由使用者重新開啟 （已的重新新增到網頁）。These controls can be reopened (added back to the page) by users.| ||包含控制項中的 Web 組件類別目錄，在網頁標記中宣告的參考。Contains references to controls that are declared in a Web Parts catalog in the markup of a Web page. 這些控制項可以加入網頁的使用者。These controls can be added to a Web page by users.| ||提供 UI，讓使用者上傳的定義檔 (具有的 XML 檔案。Web 組件延伸模組和指定的格式，其中包含狀態資訊） 至目錄中，控制項的控制項可以加入至網頁。Provides the UI for a user to upload a definition file (an XML file with a .WebPart extension and a specified format that contains state information) for a control to a catalog, so that the control can be added to a Web page.| 因為類別將只在區域樣板加入至其基底類別的行為，它會有較少的成員。Because the class adds only a zone template to the behavior of its base class, it has few members. 建構函式的預設建構函式，有了它，您可以初始化的新執行個體類別。The constructor is a default constructor; with it, you can initialize a new instance of the class. 屬性取得或設定參考物件，包含區域的控制項。The property gets or sets a reference to the object that contains the controls for the zone. 方法很重要。The method is critical. 它會覆寫基底的方法，以建立集合的所有在區域樣板中所包含的控制項。It overrides the base method to create the collection of all controls contained within the zone template. > [!NOTE] > 中的按鈕UI 需要用戶端指令碼才能正常運作。The buttons in the UI require client-side scripting in order to work correctly. 如果瀏覽器中停用指令碼，使用者將無法執行動作，透過UI。If scripting is disabled in the browser, the user will not be able to perform actions through the UI. ## 協助工具Accessibility 根據預設，此控制項所呈現的標記，也可能不符合協助工具標準，例如 Web 內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 如需有關此控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the control. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更網頁上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 自訂檔案的原始程式碼控制項，以及自訂已匯入全文檢索目錄，並加入至網頁的控制項。A file with the source code for a custom control, and a custom control that is imported by the catalog and added to the Web page. - 宣告使用者控制項，而且自訂的網頁控制項。A Web page that declares the user control, and the custom control. - 如何執行範例的說明。An explanation of how to run the example. 此程式碼範例的第一個部分是可讓使用者變更顯示模式，在網頁上的使用者控制項。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. For 詳細資料會顯示在此控制項模式和原始碼的描述，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#7)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分包含自訂程式碼和控制項。The second part of the code example contains the code for the custom and controls. 程式碼控制將示範如何繼承自類別，並自訂其屬性的建構函式中設定一些預設屬性值。The code for the control demonstrates how to inherit from the class and customize its properties by setting some default property values in the constructor. 原始碼也會示範如何建立自訂名為類別`TextDisplayWebPart`。The source code also demonstrates how to create a custom class named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 這是與相關聯的控制項。您將匯入這個程式碼範例的一部分的 web 組件描述檔案。This is the control associated with the .WebPart description file that you will import as part of this code example. 使用匯入描述檔案之後控制項在網頁上，您可以新增`TextDisplayWebPart`頁面上，完全預先設定為指定 description 檔案中的控制項。After you import the description file by using the control on the Web page, you'll be able to add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, fully pre-configured as specified in the description file. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此程式碼範例會使用動態編譯，因此如果您想要執行此範例，如此一來，將檔案命名為來源的程式碼並將它新增至 Web 應用程式的根目錄中的 [App_Code] 子資料夾。This code example uses dynamic compilation, so if you want to run the example this way, name the source code file and add it to an App_Code subfolder of your Web application's root directory. 如需示範這兩種編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/CS/catalogSamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/VB/catalogSamples.vb#1)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是包含控制項之 Web 網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 它包含`Register`使用者控制項，和另一個用於原始程式檔的自訂控制項指示詞。It contains a `Register` directive for the user control, and another for the source file with the custom controls. 請注意，在第二個指示詞，它未命名的組件，因為此範例不使用組件，它會使用動態編譯放在 App_Code 子資料夾中的原始程式碼。Note that in the second directive, it does not name the assembly, because the example does not use an assembly, it uses dynamic compilation with the source code placed in the App_Code subfolder. 網頁會宣告控制項和其子系內``元素，它會宣告控制項。The Web page declares a control, and within its child `` element, it declares a control. 雖然這是標準的 ASP.NET 控制項，它會有完整的 Web 組件功能在執行階段，因為控制任何伺服器控制項放在包裝使用物件，使其他伺服器控制項可以參與 Web組件的應用程式。While this is a standard ASP.NET control, it will have full Web Parts functionality at run time, because the control wraps any server control placed in a with a object, so that other server controls can participate in Web Parts applications. 也在此區域中宣告為 custom控制項，名為`TextDisplayWebPart`。Also declared in this zone is the custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 請注意，此控制項有屬性`ExportMode="All"`宣告它。Notice that this control has an attribute of `ExportMode="All"` declared on it. 這可讓您匯出。Web 組件描述檔，其中包含可以匯入其他使用者用來將預先設定的控制項加入至其他網頁的控制項的屬性值。This enables you to export a .WebPart description file that contains the property values of the control, which can be imported by other users to add the pre-configured control to other Web pages. > [!NOTE] > 若要讓 Web 組件之應用程式匯出的描述檔案的使用者控制項，您也必須啟用 Web 應用程式中的匯出功能，加上`enableExport="true"`屬性設定為``項目 (這是子系``項目) 的 Web.config 檔案中。To enable users of a Web Parts application to export a description file for controls, you must also enable the export feature in the Web application by adding an `enableExport="true"` attribute to the `` element (which is a child of the `` element) in the Web.config file. 預設會停用匯出，所以如果您還不會啟用應用程式的匯出，編輯 Web.config 檔案，現在執行它。Export is disabled by default, so if you not yet enabled export for your application, edit the Web.config file and do it now. 網頁也會宣告自訂控制項並在其中，``元素，其中包含控制項。The Web page also declares the custom control and, within it, a `` element that contains an control. 使用者將使用此控制項在執行階段匯入。自訂網頁組件描述檔控制項。The user will use this control at run time to import the .WebPart description file for the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/CS/catalogzonecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/VB/catalogzonevb.aspx#2)] 現在執行的程式碼範例。Now run the code example. 載入網頁瀏覽器中。Load the Web page in a browser. 第一個步驟是匯出。Web 組件的描述檔案`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。The first step is to export a .WebPart description file for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 按一下 （標題列中向下箭號表示），在自訂控制項上的動詞命令功能表，然後按一下**匯出**。Click the verbs menu on the custom control (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar), and click **Export**. 請依照下列指示來儲存控制項的說明檔案。Follow the instructions to save a description file for the control. 開啟。Web 組件描述在編輯器中，檔案，並編輯 標題屬性文字的值。Open the .WebPart description file in an editor, and edit the value of the title property text. 尋找``具有屬性的項目`name="Title"`，並編輯 標題文字的開頭和結尾之間包含``標記。Find the `` element that has the attribute `name="Title"`, and edit the title text that is contained between the opening and closing `` tags. 現在關閉網頁，並編輯網頁原始檔編輯器中。Now close the Web page, and edit the page source in an editor. 刪除``控制宣告的項目，然後儲存並關閉檔案。Delete the `` control declaration element, then save and close the file. 載入網頁瀏覽器中，一次。Load the Web page again in a browser. `TextDisplayWebPart`控制項應該會出現，因為您已經將它移除。The `TextDisplayWebPart` control should not appear, because you removed it. 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，然後選取**目錄**切換至目錄模式的頁面。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to switch the page to catalog mode. 請注意，自訂會顯示控制項，以及與控制項。Notice that the custom control appears, along with the control. 按一下 **瀏覽**按鈕來尋找。匯出的網頁組件描述檔`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。Click the **Browse** button to locate the .WebPart description file that you exported for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 您可以按一下**上傳**，選取匯入控制 旁邊的核取方塊，然後按一下**新增**將它新增至頁面。You can click **Upload**, select the check box next to the imported control, and click **Add** to add it to the page. 按一下 **關閉目錄**頁面返回標準瀏覽模式。Click **Close Catalog** to return the page to normal browse mode. 匯入的控制項現在應該會出現在頁面中，並會出現在標題列控制項的標題應該是您加入的標題文字。Web 組件描述檔案。The imported control should now appear in the page, and the title that appears in the title bar of the control should be the title text you added to the .WebPart description file.

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

para.span: 您可以建立自訂類別，如果您想要更充分掌控轉譯與目錄 UI 的行為。

span.span: You can create custom classes if you want more control over the rendering and behavior of the catalog UI.

para.span: 如果您不需要提供控制項的使用者能夠新增以宣告方式，控制，則您可以直接繼承自類別。

span.span: If you do not need to provide users of your control with the ability to add controls declaratively, then you can inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 如果您想要啟用以宣告方式新增的控制項，simples 方法是繼承自類別，因為它提供基本的區域樣板。

span.span: If you do want to enable controls to be added declaratively, the simples approach is to inherit from the class, because it provides the essential zone template.

para.span: 如果您繼承自類別，您可以覆寫方法和用法來新增自訂方法控制項新增至，如果您想要更有效地將以程式設計方式控制自訂控制項加入您的區域.

span.span: If you inherit from the class, you can override the method and use the method to add custom controls to a , if you want greater programmatic control over adding custom controls to your zone.
Web Parts Control Set Overview
Web Parts Personalization
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為控制項實作在區域樣板中，通常以宣告方式使用和您很少需要建立新的執行個體的類別使用建構函式。Because the control implements a zone template, it is usually used declaratively and you will seldom need to create a new instance of the class using the constructor. 不過，如果您繼承自類別來建立自訂的區域中，您可能想要使用的建構函式來初始化它的某些屬性值，並自訂其外觀。However, if you inherit from the class to create a custom zone, you might wish to use the constructor to initialize some of its property values and customize its appearance. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用建構函式，在自訂控制項。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the constructor in a custom control. 建構函式用來初始化控制項的一些預設屬性值。The constructor is used to initialize some default property values for the control. 下列程式碼顯示自訂頂端附近宣告建構函式類別。The following code shows the custom class with the constructor declared near the top. 如完整的程式碼和指示，才能設定及執行此範例中，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節中的類別概觀。For the full code and instructions required to set up and run the example, see the Example section in the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/CS/catalogSamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZone_Overview/VB/catalogSamples.vb#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartCollection CreateCatalogParts() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateCatalogParts () As CatalogPartCollection

summary.span: 建立區域中宣告之每個 型別的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of each type that is declared in the zone.

returns.span: ，其中含有區域中所有 控制項的參考。

span.span: A with references to all the controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一個重要的方法，因為當使用者切換至目錄顯示模式的頁面，此方法會建立所有組成 Web 組件類別目錄的控制項。The method is a critical method because when a user switches a page to catalog display mode, this method creates all the controls that make up the Web Parts catalog. 方法中的類別提供與 Web 組件控制集可以建立繼承自任何伺服器控制項類別。The method in the class provided with the Web Parts control set can create any server control that inherits from the class. 因此，如果您建立自訂控制項，並將它宣告內的頁面控制項，當使用者切換到目錄模式的頁面這個方法會建立您的控制項。So, if you create a custom control and declare it on a page within a control, this method will create your control when a user switches the page to catalog mode. 不過，基於各種原因您可能想要控制針對方法。However, for various reasons you might want control over the method. 您可能想要建立僅特定控制項。You might want it to create only certain controls. 例如，假設您建立一組自訂的控制項，會有一致的外觀，並且隸屬於單一產品或組織。For example, suppose you create a set of custom controls that have a consistent appearance and belong to a single product or organization. 如果您想要限制為在目錄中，使用這些自訂控制項的網頁開發人員，則您應該繼承自類別中覆寫方法，並允許的方法，以建立相同的型別，為您的自訂控制項的控制項。If you want page developers to be limited to using those custom controls in a catalog, then you should inherit from the class, override the method, and allow the method to create only controls of the same type as your custom controls.

exception.span: 目前的 控制項並沒有 ID。

span.span: The current control does not have an ID.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.ITemplate ZoneTemplate { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property ZoneTemplate As ITemplate
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ ZoneTemplate { System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ value); };
member this.ZoneTemplate : System.Web.UI.ITemplate with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定樣板，以頁面保存格式將子控制項包含在 控制項之中。

span.span: Gets or sets a template to contain child controls within a control in page persistence format.

value.span: ，做為區域中子控制項的容器。

span.span: An that acts as a container for child controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會參考類型的範本用來包含區域中的控制項。The property references a template of type that is used to contain the controls in the zone. 在區域樣板可讓網頁開發人員以宣告他們想要用於保存格式，而不需要以程式設計方式建立的所有控制項的控制項。The zone template enables page developers to declare the controls they want to use in persistence format, rather than having to create all the controls programmatically. Set 存取子屬性呼叫方法，它會強制集合在區域樣板中宣告，重新整理頁面的控制項。The set accessor for the property calls the method, which forces the collection of controls that are declared in the zone template on the page to be refreshed. 這可確保由區域所參考的控制項集合會保留目前每當使用者變更實際頁面上，以宣告範本內的控制項。This ensures that the collection of controls referenced by the zone remains current whenever a user changes the controls actually declared within the template on the page.

para.span: 如果您想要建立自訂區域，但您想要建立以程式設計方式控制，而不允許宣告它們的網頁開發人員，您執行不需要區域範本支援，您可以直接繼承自類別。

span.span: If you want to create a custom zone, but you plan to create the controls programmatically rather than allowing page developers to declare them, you do not need zone template support, and you can inherit directly from the class.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages
